summary: Sometimes castles and fortresses are too gigantic. Why isn't there a player home that is simple, compact and efficient, without the need to walk 5 miles to get from one area to another? Well the new and improved Hermit's Hole may be the residence for you!
descriptionHtml:
Sometimes castles and fortresses are too gigantic. Why isn't there a player home that is simple, compact and efficient, without the need to walk 5 miles to get from one area to another? Well the new and improved Hermit's Hole may be the residence for you! Become the scum of society, the outcast of your friends, shy away from big castles and enjoy the nice outdoors. This is the Hermit's Hole. Just make your way south of Whiterun on the map and look for the shack icon labeled Hermit's Hole. Don't worry about discovering it, a true bootlicker and good-for-nothing will be able to find this smelly little nook with no prior knowledge. 

---- If you have friends or any respectable social status this mod may not be for you --- 

*This mod includes: -6 Storage chests 
-Alchemy Chests 
-Multiple weapon plaques and 1 display case 
-Enchantment table, alchemy table, workbench, grindstone, tanning hide, and cooking pot. 
-All of the gods shrines 
-Clutter, with loads of items to be found ;)
author: cerberus1211
